name.value: FHIR Connectathon 15 - Provider Directory - Scenario 5 - Location Locate Endpoint - JSON

description.value: Location search capabilities tests; resource format JSON; validate telecom, physical address and endpoint; Endpoint resource to be returned via _include; test a FHIR server's Location search operation support using the parameters: name, address, address-city, address-postalcode and address-state. Default values for the search parameters are based on the Location Resource Example and can be modified to allow testing against other known Location resource instances.
Location read and search operations
Search Location using the name search parameter with the provided name data value.
Search for Location matches using the name search.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is JSON.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.

Confirm that there are at least two records returned - a Location and included Endpoint. Although not expected, there could be other Location and Endpoint records returned. Warning only to allow for Endpoint to be contained in the Location.
Confirm that the Bundle total value matches or is greater than the number of entries in the Bundle.

Confirm that there are Location and included Endpoint returned resources. Although not expected, there could be other Location and Endpoint records returned. Warning only to allow for Endpoint to be contained in the Location.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as Location).exists() and Bundle.entry.select(resource as Endpoint).exists()
